type.description:
## Exists

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/exists)

Checks if the entity exists.

Type ID: `origins:exists`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:exists"
}
```
